channel.title: Gauntlet Con In Demand: The One Shots You Asked For!
channel.description:
One last thread of Gauntlet Con Links!
Thanks to my friend @BlakeRyan, we've pulled together a list of games that showed up as in-demand from our interest surveys earlier this summer. Check out the two posts below, one of PbtA and Storygames and one of OSR Adventures!

item.title: Gauntlet Con In Demand: The One Shots You Asked For!
item.dc:creator: @RichardRuane
item.description:
@RichardRuane wrote:

OSR Adventure One-Shots!

And now for a topic close to my own heart: there’s a lot of OSR adventure sessions this year! Here’s a few to keep your eyes on…

  • GM David Shugars of GMDK (Special Guest!) Whitehack https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LoxA3IYumObp_RJ3sYs
  • GM Steven Karnes The Black Hack https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LoG_qcdQ0RLvi5cZ5T6
    – Also https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LoGk0lldUcyMlyFSErZ
  • GM Ben L. (Special Guest!) Advanced Labyrinth Lord: Descent into the White Jungle https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LortrhZdbO0G4kgJRlg
  • GM Diogo Nogueira (Special Guest!) Solar Blades & Cosmic Spells https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lo5zfWZxUy7B7I2vyGc
    – Also Dark Streets & Darker Secrets https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lo60uVwawe5UEM4rscn
  • GM Brendan LaSalle (Special Guest!) Dungeon Crawl Classics https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lo7DUaV6uAG1ScV8OW0
    – Also, https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lo7FqxaMHLoOJ9KnxXR
    – Also, https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lo7ESaWEvVldUGghwOW
    – Also Xcrawl Classics https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lo7FLDtWTeFgGM1I11y
  • GM Abigail LaLonde (Special Guest!), Cat Hack/Kid Hack https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LoS7ewjTBvMbaY8kL8W
  • GM Camilla Greer with GMDK (Special Guest!), Flailsnails: Night School from Demon Collective, Vol 1 https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LomebGfxLMmYDiKpiF5
  • GM Will Broom, Maze Rats: Veins of the Earth https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lnut6EeQ1ek6XKi2NGC
  • GM Sean F. Smith, Quarrel & Fable https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LnsqflDktG5HrpxuSB7
    – Also The Cthulhu Hack, https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lnsp5LnUq99zBtPiuhg
  • GM FM Geist with GMDK (Special Guest!), Into the Odd https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LogErWj-jrbj6YjW2g4
  • GM Maria Rivera, Troika! https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LoHG9N_GGoVYg2kPcge
    – Also Godbound https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LoHHCxLlJ6X-HOn-Wce
  • GM Humza Kazmi (Special Guest!), B/X: Misty Isles of the Eld https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpBvmTQsw43Lc3U39tk
  • GM Richard Ruane, Dark Streets & Darker Secrets: Moonlight on Roseville Beach, https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpV6MtkgyJjZrKsOHfE
    – Also, Barrow Keep, https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpUs12hkabLMO9qx0ik
  • GM Dylan Ross (The First Keeper!), OSR Homebrew!, https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpLB9UNv4X4XDH75BtD

You asked for Dungeon World, and our GMs delivered!

    – Also https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LnsoXp46CfXTNQs2cYb

  • GM Justin Ford: https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lo1C4dPpGGO5Qjc2kog
    – Also https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lo1EduRDgvSP8X1MXni
  • GM Steven Karnes: https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LoGx27h1jAj1RA_t1Im
  • GM Blaise Hébert: https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpF-Tqt76FXPlboAnEA
    – Also https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpF0Dn_Y7HDAaXxHnWv
  • GM Robbie Boerth: https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpG-lC3_gD6CW4rtKox
    – Also https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpFzzNdlSGtjH8KKsCm
  • GM Kyle Maxwell: https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lp0g4oLCTxpH7hgXBQq
    – Also https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lp0b8-sOstSPrdJIcjY
  • GM Walter German: https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpRejRFXQymsLxjZ3S0
    – Also https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpRfX-Q9dlRVUos1eLu
  • GM Michael Mendoza: https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LoIaWDYI6naGTixH5Z4

Masks

In addition to series games, like the one run by @king_taran, there’s some Masks oneshots!

  • GM Jason Cox: https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpB0xPUd8G553sp4Qw7
  • GM Alexi Sargeant: https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LoNBgu_nuVD3-i4kwuZ
  • GM Angela Murray (of The Gnomecast with Gauntlet Con guests Misdirected Mark): https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpPyx-YhcWG6ipqhC8r

Monsterhearts

So much Monsterheats, and so many materials from Codex!

  • Emerald City Drama Club with GM @DavidMorrison: https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lo56vi_I7Cp4M7M0y7s
  • Balhir with GM @Donogh: https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lnvg610shi8ge5GTKiQ
  • Godric’s School for Troubled Youths with GM @dexter: https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpJyQyRNRlD6emb5cG2
    – Murder in Metro 17: https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpK8sfCIfD4LfIjPpUt
  • Once Again, We Return with GM @Thoobn!: https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LoHEiSDS7-cBKzOFs8k
  • Jagged Season, GM Xai: https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LoLycyxB1UnwU6i0cpN
    – Also https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LnwhOAoJI3TqKzD95PS

Trophy

Jesse Ross’s breakout game will see a good bit of play at Gauntlet Con.

  • Forest of Blades, GM Ludo: https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpZ52j_Ys62iD2sSVlW
    – Also, To Make My Bread: https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LpZ52j_Ys62iD2sSVlW
  • Spiderglass Forest, GM Sabine: https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LogE_JWMgCrLj72YZBH
  • The Flocculent Cathedral, GM @JimLikesGames: https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LogE_JWMgCrLj72YZBH

World of Dungeons

  • GM Lu Quade: https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lp1jiFrCcLPIO7OCB08
  • GM Michael G. Barford: https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lp1jiFrCcLPIO7OCB08
